fraction.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a very small amount of something
fraction.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I got these shoes at a fraction of the original price.
She paused for a fraction of a second.
fraction.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a part of a whole number in mathematics, such as ½ or ¾
